summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OrderMate WhatsApp order tracking system. Backend fully functional (23/23 tests passed). Frontend mostly functional with minor UI interaction issues in order creation form.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection for delivery method not working properly with Playwright automation
Submit button click intercepted by overlay - HTML element intercepts pointer events

passed_tests: JWT authentication for all roles (admin, showroom, furkan, esat, ozgen)
Role-based access control (Users menu hidden for showroom)

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (core functionality working, minor UI interaction issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend dropdown selection and button click overlay issues in OrderCreate component. The delivery method dropdown and submit button have interaction problems that prevent smooth order creation flow. Consider using different UI library components or fixing z-index/overlay issues.
